segments.text: Jenny , Can you come and help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's dusty everywhere in the house . Can you help me do the housecleaning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I will call Peter to clean it together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's my good girl . The clothes need washing . I'll do the laundry .
segments.speaker: S1
